resources.string: The quiz consists of five questions of various types. There are negative points for choosing the wrong answers, so choose wisely! Good luck!
The leader (captain) of the Seven Deadly Sins is called...
Check all the members of the Seven Deadly Sins:
Britannia was once beset in a Holy War between the Four Races (Human, Giant, Fairy, and Goddess) and the...
...causing great destruction and death in the continent until the allied clans claimed victory with the...
...sealing away the Demon Realm from Britannia.
A bar that is founded, owned and run by Meliodas is called...
Check all the present and former Great Holy Knights:
